seo.title: Garmin GPSMAP® 1022 w/o transducer | Marine Chartplotter
seo.ogDescription: GPSMAP® 1022xsv is a chartplotter with a 10-inch display w/ built-in single channel CHIRP sonar, CHIRP ClearVü & CHIRP SideVü scanning sonar & Panoptix™ support.

overviewTab.title: Overview

mapsTab.title: Maps
mapsTab.content:
Maps for New Regions

Need maps for regions other than the ones that came on your device? See all maps that are compatible with your device.

Need a map update?

Update the maps that came with your device for the best navigation experience.

Check for Updates

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• GPSMAP 1022xsv chartplotter
  • Power/data cable
  • NMEA 2000 T-connector
  • NMEA 2000 drop cable (2 m)
  • 8-pin transducer to 12-pin sounder adapter cable
  • Bail mount kit with knobs
  • Flush mount kit with gasket
  • Protective cover
  • Trim piece snap covers
  • Documentation

productEmsList.tooltip:
Worldwide basemap: Non-detailed map for general reference.
Garmin Navionics+™: Detailed charts for coastal/inland water and lakes.
productEmsList.title: Charts and Maps

productEmsList.tooltip:
Traditional CHIRP: Good for displaying fish arches.

ClearVü: Excellent for displaying fish and structure below your boat.

SideVü: Excellent for displaying fish and structure to the sides of your boat.
productEmsList.title: Sonar Type
